title: Mel Karade Rabba
overview: Mel Karade Rabba is a 2010 Punjabi film directed by Navaniat Singh with story, screenplay and dialogue by Dheeraj Rattan; produced by Rajan Batra and Vivek Ohri; and starring Jimmy Shergill, Gippy Grewal, Neeru Bajwa, Amar Noorie, Sunita Dhir and Shavinder Mahal.[1]  Mel Karade Rabba released on 16 July 2010 globally.
